signature: Transformer<I, O> ifTransformer(Predicate<? super I>, Transformer<? super I, ? extends O>, Transformer<? super I, ? extends O>)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before invoking the ifTransformer method to ensure proper predicate and transformer initialization.
Initializing predicates before calling ifTransformer ensures that the predicates are in the correct state for evaluation.
Verifying the output of the transformer ensures that the ifTransformer method behaves as expected based on the predicate evaluation.
Comparing the results of different transformers can help validate the correctness of the ifTransformer method's conditional logic.
